name: HeartBeatDungeon
description:
In HeartBeat Dungeon you must defeat every fiend on each room to keep advancing. 

Be careful, as the dungeon has an effect on your heart, you have to control it yourself, remember to keep pumping blood or you will die. Dont rush either, as your heart can’t take too much preassure.

Depending on how fast your heartbeat is, the adrenaline in your body will make things appear faster or slower. Good luck adventurer!
-Left Click to Attack
-Right Click to Pump Blood
-Move with AWSD
